HomePage.title:
Building bridges between
ideas and screens.
HomePage.subtitle: I am a trainee web developer, currently in a work-study program.
HomePage.stackDescription: Still learning, I opted for a stack I’m comfortable with, but I remain open to all opportunities to learn new technologies.
HomePage.projectsDescription: Here is some projects I made during my journey
HomePage.projectsDescriptionStoryTeller: Collaborative literary creation platform based on the concept of "cadavre exquis". This application allows users to participate in the writing of collective stories, developed as part of an academic end-of-studies project.
HomePage.projectsDescriptionDreams: Web application to track and rate your readings, using the Google Books API, developed as part of an academic end-of-studies project.
HomePage.projectsDescriptionAdopteUnCube: Showcase site designed and developed for a community of players, mainly focused on Minecraft. I took charge of the entire design and technical implementation.
